[h1]Multidimensional Arrays[/h1]

An array can have multiple dimensions. A [b]multidimensional [/b]array is declared as follows:[code format="cs" ]type[, , … ,] arrayName = new type[size1, size2, …, sizeN];[/code]
For example, let's define a two-dimensional 3x4 integer array: [code format="cs" ]int[ , ] x = new int[3,4];[/code]
Visualize this array as a table composed of 3 rows and 4 columns: [img id="2422" width="100%"]
